channel.title: Bhaskar Vamsi's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Bhaskar Vamsi's Personal Blog

item.title: GhostintheAttic_short
item.description: Vamsi was a 12-year-old boy who lived with his father. He was very healthy, a bit too healthy, one can say. He was round like a tomato, and that’s what his classmates used to call him. He wasn’t very popular and didn’t have any friends. They had recently moved to a new city where his father got a new job and had bought a new house on the outskirts of the town because it was a bit close to his work and Vamsi’s new School.
